SELECT rno, qno, qupno, mno, id, qtitle, qbody, avatar, qdate, qedate, click, step FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, qno, qupno, mno, id, qtitle, qbody, avatar, qdate, qedate, click, step FROM ( SELECT qno, NVL(qupno, 0) qupno, mno, id, qtitle, qbody, savename avatar, qdate, qedate, click, (level - 1) step FROM qna q, member m, avatar a WHERE q.isshow = 'Y' AND qmno = mno AND avt = ano START WITH qupno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR qno = qupno ORDER SIBLINGS BY qdate DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
